modName: Skyrim Character Customizations - Play As Spartacus
summary: I decided to make Spartacus as I am a big fan of the series and I know a lot of you guys have been asking me to make him. I hope he turned out the way you wanted him.
descriptionHtml:
[center]

[img]https://fbcdn-sphotos-h-a.akamaihd.net/hphotos-ak-ash3/543407_465580306882236_1227006292_n.jpg[/img]

Elder Scrolls Skyrim: How to Create Spartacus 

I decided to make Spartacus as I am a big fan of the series and I know a lot of you guys have been asking me to make him. I hope he turned out the way you wanted him.

[b]Mods Used[/b]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2488]Better Males[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2356]XCE - Xenius Character Enhancement[/url]

[b]Creation Numbers[/b]
Race: Nord
Weight: 7
Complexion: 0
Dirt: 0
Nose Type: 8
Jaw Width: 8
Jaw Forward 10
Cheekbon Height: 0
Eyeshape: 14
Eye Colour: 9
Eye Height: 9
Eye Width: 1
Eye Depth: 8
Brow Width: 16
Brow Forward: 12
Forhead colour: 1
Brow: 0
Hair: 28
Facial Hair: 2
Hair Colour: 11

Made in memory of the true Spartacus: Andy Whitfield - R.I.P 


Head over to my Youtube channel for my Character Customizations
https://www.youtube.com/user/DeadStatix

[/center]
author: DeadStatix
